35.1.behavioral_axis: Can take a ‘no’ and keep moving through the experience cycle.
35.1.shadow_axis: Takes rejection as humiliation; stops seeking new experiences.

35.2.hd_quote: Lack of inspiration which stops progress.
35.2.behavioral_axis: Senses when the experiential strand has run dry and needs renewal.
35.2.shadow_axis: Forces progress without inspiration → empty motion.

35.3.hd_quote: The whole is greater than the sum of its parts.
35.3.behavioral_axis: Knows progress accelerates through interaction and shared stories.
35.3.shadow_axis: Insists on being the center and blocks collaborative progress.

35.4.behavioral_axis: Feels ‘it’s time for a change’ and moves the cycle forward.
35.4.shadow_axis: Change for change’s sake; burns out self and group.

35.5.hd_quote: The sacrifice of personal for communal progress.
35.5.behavioral_axis: Uses experience and communication to bring beneficial change to the whole.
35.5.shadow_axis: Resentment when personal expansion feels sacrificed.

35.6.behavioral_axis: Applies experience to correct course and crystallize what actually works.
